test.instr: (:ins (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X blue) (sort Y closet) (type Y container))) (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (sort Y closet))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X television))) (:task (putdown X) (:cond (color X yellow) (sort X bottle))) )
test.nl: Put the blue book in the closet. Take out the cup from the closet. Go to the television. Put down the yellow bottle.
